keyword: how many calories in a sugar cookie
title: How Many Calories in a Sugar Cookie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a sugar cookie, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations like frosted options.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sugar Cookie?
assumptions: Medium-sized (about 30g), homemade or store-bought, plain (no frosting), baked with butter and sugar.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, brand, frosting, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical sugar cookie contains about 120 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sugar cookie?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal for a medium plain sugar cookie.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a sugar cookie?
faqs.a: Roughly 17 g carbs, including 10 g sugars and 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does frosting add many calories to a sugar cookie?
faqs.a: Yes, about 50 extra kcal per teaspoon of frosting.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a sugar cookie?
faqs.a: Around 5 g total fat, with 3 g saturated.

faqs.q: Are sugar cookies high in sodium?
faqs.a: Moderate at 100 mg per cookie; varies by recipe.
